<title level="1" right="Hazard 5" pfs="">[Grasping Dead](/Hazards.aspx?ID=153)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Complex" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=30" />
<trait label="Haunt" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=88" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Book of the Dead](/Sources.aspx?ID=118) pg. 68</row>

**Complexity** Complex

</column>

Hands of the buried dead rise from the ground, grabbing and tearing at creatures in the area to drag them underground.

---

**Stealth**
+12 (expert)

**Disable**
DC 22 [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) (trained) to ritually pray for the dead or DC 24 [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) (trained) to exorcise the spirits' anger; two total successes are required to disable the haunt

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

**Shifting Earth** <actions string="Reaction" /> **Trigger** At least two creatures enter the area; **Effect** The earth shifts wildly as the hands of the dead spring forth from the ground. The area becomes difficult terrain. Creatures within the area are knocked [prone](/Conditions.aspx?ID=31) unless they succeed at a DC 26 Reflex save. The haunt then rolls initiative.

---
**Routine**
(1 action) The grasping hands batter all creatures in the area, dealing 2d6+7 bludgeoning damage (DC 26 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save). On a critical failure, a creature is dragged partially into the earth, becoming [immobilized](/Conditions.aspx?ID=24) until it [Escapes](/Actions.aspx?ID=79) (DC 26). If already immobilized, it's fully submerged and must hold its breath to avoid [suffocation](/Rules.aspx?ID=468).

---
**Reset**
The haunt deactivates 1 minute after all living creatures leave the area. After 1 hour, the haunt reactivates.
